name: Radioactive farm simulator - Prototype
description:
\========================/ |Hello, user of the site itch.io. | /========================\

You have visited the game page - radioactive farmers simulator. This game is only a prototype. The game has no balance and have bugs.

The essence of the game is the breeding of new plants that will have this or that behavior depending on the radiation. 

-Do you want to create your own unusual plant? Then download the game and create. 

Instructions for the game, near the seed dispensing station)
